casebody.data:
PACIFIC MAIL STEAMSHIP COMPANY, Appellee, v. UNION STEVEDORING CORPORATION, Appellant. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 2, 1929. No. 43. Alfred L. Marilley, of New York City (Martin Conboy, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Burlingham, Veeder, Fearey, Clark & Hupper, of New York City (Ray Rood Allen and Frederic Conger, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
